name: Hide & Beak
description:
Hide & Beak is a top-down survival game about finding food and avoiding becoming a meal yourself.

You play as a Koi living in a small pond with some other smaller fish. You need to find food, and luckily there are plenty of water bugs zipping around the surface of your pond.

But you are not the only one looking for food...

The Heron is flying above you hoping to catch a nice meal. Make sure you hide under cover as he passes or swim fast enough to avoid his beak!

If you enjoy this game, please consider making a donation!

Goal

Light all the lanterns to win.

Eat one bug to light one lantern.

Don't let the heron eat you.

Controls

Left/Right Arrow or A/D - Pivot Left or Right

Down Arrow or S - Brake/Reverse (Hold)

Space - Swim forward (Tap)

Backspace - Return to the menu

Info

Game can be played in browser or on Windows using the installer
